title: SetSessionConfigAspectClockValidPeriod (Method)
text:
METHOD SetSessionConfigAspectClockValidPeriod :
Error
Set optional channel configuration aspect - clock valid period.

rows.Name: clockValidPeriod
rows.Comment:
Specifies how long the local clock will remain valid after receiving
a time synchronization. (or after sdnpsesn_restartClockValidTime is called)
